title: US axes website for reporting human rights abuses by US-armed foreign forces
author: tartoran
aiHeadline: US government takes a stand against transparency by shutting down a website that dared to report on human rights abuses by US-armed foreign forces—because who needs accountability, right?

title: Trump pardons convicted Binance founder
author: cowboyscott
aiHeadline: In a shocking twist, Trump pardons the convicted Binance founder, proving that even in the crypto world, connections can get you out of hot water.

title: VST3 audio plugin format is now MIT
author: rock_artist
aiHeadline: VST3 audio plugin format goes open-source with MIT license—because who doesn't love free plugins and more creative freedom?

title: What happened to Apple's legendary attention to detail?
author: Bogdanp
aiHeadline: AI's questionable judgment leads to armed police swarming a student over a bag of Doritos—because nothing says 'I'm a threat' like a snack.

title: Armed police swarm student after AI mistakes bag of Doritos for a weapon
author: antongribok
aiHeadline: Apple's legendary attention to detail? More like 'legendary' in the past tense—because who needs polished products when you can have a bunch of half-baked features?
